mapper.select: SELECT rds.EQP_ID, rds.EQP_TYP, rds.MODEL_TYP, rds.BATCH_YN, rds.INLINE_YN, rds.EQP_INLINE_SEQ, rds.EQP_INLINE_ID, rds.SORTER_MODE_AVAIL_YN, pos.STAT_CD, pos.PROC_STAT_CD, pos.CTRL_MODE_CD, pos.OPRTN_MODE_CD, pos.SORTER_MODE_YN, pos.AUTO_DSP_YN, pos.INTLK_YN FROM TN_RDS_EQP rds, TN_POS_EQP pos WHERE 1 = 1 AND rds.SITE_ID = pos.SITE_ID AND rds.EQP_ID = pos.EQP_ID AND rds.USE_STAT_CD = pos.USE_STAT_CD AND rds.SITE_ID = #{siteId} AND rds.USE_STAT_CD = #{useStatCd} AND rds.EQP_ID = #{eqpId}

SELECT rds.PORT_ID ,rds.PORT_TYP ,rds.CARR_TYP ,pos.ACES_MODE_CD ,pos.CTRL_MODE_CD ,pos.STAT_CD ,pos.TRSF_STAT_CD ,pos.CARR_ID FROM TN_RDS_PORT rds,TN_POS_PORT pos WHERE rds.SITE_ID = pos.SITE_ID AND rds.EQP_ID = pos.EQP_ID AND rds.PORT_ID = pos.PORT_ID AND rds.SITE_ID = #{siteId} AND rds.USE_STAT_CD = #{useStatCd} AND rds.EQP_ID = #{eqpId} AND rds.PORT_ID = #{portId}
